description: Some unfortunate note left by the dead.

text.text: I'm the last one, everything hurts and the bleeding won't stop. Something is in the meat.
God is dead. We dragged him down from Heaven and killed him.
It's airborne, stay away from them. The army is burning it out.
Approached the tan soldiers for help after we ran out of food. They fired beams of light at us.
Don't drink the water. They put something in it to kill us.
THEY DID THIS TO US! THOSE TAN BASTARDS! THE GOVERNMENT KNEW!
Fled here when the plague was near. The dead started walking, so the government shelled us.
They scorched and trashed the state, maybe to stop the spread. The CDC shoot at us.
Smoke blotted the sun, ash and soot coating the ground. When it blew away, just sand and dust remained.
Weeks after the deluge of fire these strange new plants are cropping up, can't wait any longer for food.
Whatever we're dealing with is viral, antibiotics won't work.
From contact with other groups I've identified at least three strains of plague, each with dramatic and unique symptoms. It has to be manmade.
Watch out for the green suits, they tried to burn me.
It's over, you'll be joining me soon too.
